text:
23˚Epaphras,˙
      my fellow prisoner in Christ Jesus,˙
      sends greetings to you,˙
24˚and so do˙
      Mark, Aristarchus, Demas, and Luke,˙
      my fellow workers.

25˚The grace of the Lord˙
                    Jesus Christ˙
       be with your spirit.

God: Gives grace to the spirits of man
Paul: Had Epaphras with him in prison
Had Mark, Aristarchus, Demas and Luke with him

definitions.fellow prisoner: G4869 synaichmalōtos (συναιχμάλωτος); a fellow prisoner; from σύν which denotes union and from αἰχμάλωτος which means captive, or prisoner of war
definitions.spirit: G4151 pneumatos (πνεύματος); the vital principle by which the body is animated; the rational spirit, the power by which a human being feels, thinks, wills, decides; the soul
